page.title: 03BUS SERVICES, RUGELEY
page.content: Rugeley is served by 3 bus companies, these are Midland Red (including Mercian and Chaserider), Green Bus Company and Stevensons Coaches. Rugeley is not on the national express coach routes but local buses go to Birmingham and other towns on national routes. Daytime services have a frequency of about 30 minutes but evening bus services are infrequent and finish by 10.30 or 11.00 pm. Buses are cheap compared with the railway. For example, an adult day return by bus to Stafford is Â£1.20, by train the fare is nearly Â£2.00. The buses themselves can be dirty and noisy and are not often on time. People feel uncomfortable travelling by bus especially late at night because of the fear of rowdy passengers. Despite this there is a strong rivalry between the operators to provide services.
